title: Passion, Fire and Fury
description: Swept off her feet by an irresistible man, Cassandra Williams left herhome town two years ago, abandoning her long-time love, Tim. But afterMr. Irresistible leaves her high and dry, Cass heads for home and thecomforting arms of her parents. She never expected a warm welcome fromTim, and she's shocked to discover he still has feelings for her.However, Tim's unstable fianc√©e isn't about to let him go...A romantic/thriller novelette of 10,000 words.
author: M.A. Comley
